name: Tank wars (online)
description:
TANK WARS

This is the new online game produced by Ansel games which is meant to run on windows. The game is still in making and might still receive some updates .

Features

Country war

This is a new war interface with different countries .It also rates your skill levels

Friend players

It also support a 3 Player engine which allows you to fight against friends

How to play

Download the how-to-play- video on the basics on how to play the game Screenshots

Ansel Games 2021
